managementsystem

Class ManagementSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • managementsystem.ManagementSystem

  • public class ManagementSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    ManagementSystem class, contains references to all equipments of the system, to all asks, loans and users. Allows access on all of them by the use of search methods. Fields are a Models instance, an ArrayLists of loans, asks and users and a HashMaps where keys are Model instances and values are ArrayLists of equipment matching the model. The class is automatically instantiated at the beginning of the program execution and can be get by the static getManagementSystem method. Several methods are unused, the class should be cleaned. initial code by: Ana誰s Marongiu, Marc Karassev; modified by: Marc Karassev, Hugo Simond, Anthony Sara誰s
    Author:
    Marc Karassev, Hugo Simond, Anthony Sara誰s, Ana誰s Marongiu
